description: Russian security officials face EU sanctions over the attack on Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny.
title: Navalny Novichok poisoning: EU sanctions hit top Russians
title_page: Navalny Novichok poisoning: EU sanctions hit top Russians - BBC News
maintext: The EU statement on Thursday says that "taking into account that Alexei Navalny was under surveillance at the time of his poisoning, it is reasonable to conclude that the poisoning was only possible with the involvement of the Federal Security Service".
